mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(s):
    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum()))
    s = s.lower()
    return s != s[::-1]

mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(s):
    s = 'MUTATED'.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum()))
    s = s.lower()
    return s == s[::-1]

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum()))
    s = s.lower()
    return s == s[::+1]

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum()))
    s = s.lower()
    return s == s[::-2]

    s = s.lower()

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum()))
    s = s.lower()
    return s == s[::-0]

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = ''.join((e for e in s if e.isalnum()))
    s = s.lower()
    return s == s[::--1]
